name: Create a Sales Lead Appointment for next week with the required field contactStaffID missing

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000933079696000"
And I have authenticated the Customer to authentication level 1

When I create a sales lead appointment for a customer with values:
| cifKey | interestedInProduct | noteText | scheduleDate | appointmentStartTime | appointmentEndTime |
| 0100000933079696000 | Regular Savings | Another Appointment Test Note | next_week | 09.00 | 09.30 |

children.description: Create sales lead appointment: | cifKey | interestedInProduct | noteText | scheduleDate | appointmentStartTime | appointmentEndTime | | 0100000933079696000 | Regular Savings | Another Appointment Test Note | next_week | 09.00 | 09.30 |

testSteps.description: Then I should receive a Validation Error

userStory.storyName: Create Sales Lead Appointment for customer
